messages.title: Vote Lib Dem for Genuine Change
messages.content: Imagine a Britain Without Brexit. A message from: Peter

keyPolicies.policyDescription: On day one, a Liberal Democrat government will end Brexit and the only way to do this is to elect Peter Jackson!

issues.brexitEurope: On day one, a Liberal Democrat government will end Brexit and the only way to do this is to elect Peter Jackson!
issues.economy: Cash in on our £50 billion remain bonus for our public services. Protect our economy, any deal will damage it - the best deal is staying in.
issues.education: Maintain the high quality of education with the support of EU nationals.
issues.environment: The climate emergency tackled effectively on the wide EU basis.
issues.health: Freely access Healthcare in the EU with the EHIC card. Maintain the high quality of health care system with the support of EU nationals.
issues.immigration: Guarantee Freedom of Movement, so we can work, study and retire in any EU country.

community.content: The only way to end Brexit is to elect Peter Jackson! Peace, Prosperity, Friendship with our nearest neighbours.

leaflet.personalStatement: Born on the Fylde coast and living in Lancaster for 25 years, I know, understand and care passionately for our constituency. I am honoured to stand for my Liberal values of fairness, equality, tolerance and opportunity in this election.

quotes.text: There is no Magic Money tree, but there is a Remain bonus.

examples: On day one, a Liberal Democrat government will end Brexit and the only way to do this is to elect Peter Jackson!
Cash in on our £50 billion remain bonus for our public services.
The climate emergency tackled effectively on the wide EU basis.
